subject: re:You need these pills
body:
Dear valued member.
The Spring Sale at MyCanadianPharmacy is on - hurry up to best generic Canadian products with an up-to-20% discount.
Don't be afraid of the word "Canadian" - the product offered is produced at branch plants of Pfizer, Johnson & Johnson and other major USA manufacturers which already means that the quality of the product is unimpeachable.
Visit our licensed shop to learn more about Spring Specials. http://humannext.hk
-------------------------------------------
Sincerely yours,Noel Sharp
